EmailTemplate.description: Sent to requestor when a puppet digital playdate form is submitted online.
EmailTemplate.name: Puppet Digital Playdate Request Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: We can't wait to meet you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!PuppetShow__c.Requestor_First_Name__c},
Thanks for booking a Puppet Digital Playdate, we canâ€™t wait to hang out with {!PuppetShow__c.Child_s_First_Name__c}!
A Camp Quality team member will be in touch in the next 3 business days to finalise your booking. If you need to get hold of us you can phone us on 1300 662 267 or email puppetplaydates@campquality.org.au.
From,
Kylie, Dean and Mel
VIPs (Very Important Puppets)
